Name: Cards of Patience
About the game: Cards of Patience combines solitaire-like gameplay with RPG and roguelite elements. Choose your hero and fight against a variety of enemies by destroying all their cards. Use different levelable spells and equip yourself with powerful items and potions that will make your fights easier. Each run is different, but death is not the end: Gain powerful diamond orbs through each victory that unlock permanent upgrades or even new heroes. Key Features: - Turn-based card battles - Different heroes with different talent trees - A variety of items and potions - Randomly generated - Roguelite through permanent upgrades
